root.name: Outlaw Golf
root.description: Characters Summer - She is a stripper and a scientist.Harley - BikerEl Suave - Ladies manIce Trey - A lame rapperSuki - A DominatrixKiller Miller - Former inmateClem - HillbillyDonna - Party girlTrixie - Spoiled rich girlHarvest - Mad hippie Commentary Steve Carell is the commentator for this game, while Dave Attell is the announcer.
